scripts.test: lerna run --stream test && mkdir -p ./coverage && ts-node scripts/collect.ts && nyc merge ./coverage ./coverage/coverage.json && ts-node scripts/remap.ts
scripts.test:ci: lerna run --stream test:ci && mkdir -p ./coverage && ts-node scripts/collect.ts && nyc merge ./coverage ./coverage/coverage.json && ts-node scripts/remap.ts && cat coverage/lcov.info | coveralls
